thread.title: When 4 mosters are killed -> Open Door

post.author: Boz
post.body:
Hi!

Does anyone know how to open a door when 4 specific monsters are killed?

Thanks for any replies!

post.author: obihb
post.body: Well, haven't done it but I would guess you tag them with a trigger_count and let it count to 4.

post.author: eskimo roll
post.body: That's going to require some scripting, check out the quake3world.org scripting forum for more information, it may even be worth posting this question there.

post.author: obihb
post.body: Just did a quick test. Create a trigger_count and tag your 4 monsters with it. Then tag the trigger with what you want to trigger, like the door you want to open. Add 4 to the trigger count and that's it. Also remember to use the no_touch or locked keys on the door entity or it'll open anyway if you get close to it.
